column4: I have just upgraded my Ubuntu 8.10 to Karmik, and mysql server does not work, during the installation it says that the package mysql-server-5.1 had dependencies problems and could not be configured Â¿? Any clue? The server was working pretty goog in my old 8.10. Thanks
so it's late for me? I had to remove the mysql-server and mysql-client before perfomring the upgrade?
i'm not really familiar with the issue - i just remember reading about it in the release notes, and thus sent them to you.  Good luck.
